dc-workflow.title: Proposal Workflow
dc-workflow.description: - Always editable by Administrator. States: private- proposer can edit and share, submitter can submit; submitted-owner can view but not change, manager can assign reviewers; under_review: reviewer can read and add review form; Approved/Alternate/Denied-reviewers and owner can view but not change, manager can change.

state.title: Advisor Review
state.description: In this state the owner (creator/original proposer) and anybody with edit permission can edit. Anybody in a group that has the "Submitter" role can submit the proposal.

state.title: Alternate
state.description: Alternate usually means approved pending availability of funding.

state.title: Panel Review
state.description: Only panelists and administrators can access reviews in this state.

state.title: Private
state.description: Can only be seen and edited by the owner.

state.title: Submitted
state.description: Item is ready for grading and review.

state.title: Under Review
state.description: In this state reviewers and owners can see the proposals

transition.title: Retract Submission
transition.description: Returns the submission to the private state.

transition.title: Send Back
transition.description: Return a submission to the private state

transition.title: To advisor for review
transition.action: Send to Advisor for approval and submission

transition.title: To Alternate Visible
transition.description: Moves to the Alternate Visible State.

transition.title: To alternate invisible
transition.description: Moves the proposal to the alternate invisible state.

transition.title: To approved invisible
transition.description: Moves the proposal to the approved invisible state.

transition.title: To denied invisible
transition.description: This moves the proposal to the Denied Invisible state

transition.title: To Panel Review
transition.description: Moves the proposal into the Panel Review State

transition.title: Mark as Under Review
transition.description: Moves the under review state where it can be reviewed but not modified by the owner.

variable.description: The ID of the user who performed the last transition
When the previous transition was performed
